name: Isabella Bag
description: Brown leather school style satchel bag. Wear to buckles and handle, but nothing excessive, in overall very good condition. Holds A4 files. *Measurements are taken whilst laid flat and are approximates* Height: 9.25" Width: 12.5" Depth: 3" Condition: Very good All of the items on Rebecca’s Raincoat are vintage, and subsequently, not all items will be in perfect condition. I grade my items either Excellent, Very Good or Good, and will mention any flaws. Please bear in mind that all items have been previously worn, so may have slight fading or very minor flaws. Do not hesitate to contact me if you would like to see more photos etc. Shipping is currently only available in the UK. All items are £2.95 via Second Class Recorded, and £1.50 for additional items. Please let me know if you need the items quicker and I can arrange for First Class Recorded. I ship all my items within 48 hours of purchase (unless otherwise stated). I try my best to describe the items as best as I can. If you feel like your item has been excessively misrepresented please contact me within three days of receipt of the item to request a refund in the form of a store credit or exchange. All items must be returned within 7 days of receipt with proof of delivery. Buyer is responsible for all shipping costs for returns. Follow @RebeccaRaincoat
